description: Table showing number of Restrictive Physical Interventions (RPIs) in young offender institutions (YOIs), secure training centres (STCs) and secure childrens homes (SCHs) and number of single separation incidents at secure training centres (STCs) and secure children's homes (SCHs); Ratio of single separation incidents to young persons in secure training centres (STCs) and secure childrens homes (SCHs) and Ratio of RPIs to young persons in young offender institutions (YOIs), secure training centres (STCs) and secure childrens homes (SCHs), for the period April 2007  March 2009. 15 p.
